content: the front measures the same as the back bind off all stitches 2024 copyright pattern and images - marny kindness 2 front left pick up stitches from front left knit for 4 / 10cm begin decreases on the left side of the neck row 1 - knit to 3 sts k2tog k1 1 st decreased row 2 - purl repeat these 2 row til 14 sts stockinette stitch until the front measures the same as the back bind off all stitches seam shoulders together for each side sleeves with a larger needle pick up 44 sts around the armhole beginning at the armpit place beginning of round marker knit 18 rounds in stockinette stitch decreases round 1 - k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 2 stitches decreased round 2 - knit round 3 - knit round 4 - knit repeat rounds 1 - 4 until the sleeve measures 16 / cm can add length here if you want make sure you end your decrease rounds in a stitch count divisible by 4 for example - 32 or 28 cuff switch to a smaller needle *k2 p2* for 2 / 5cm approx 7 rounds bind off loosely in 2 x 2 rib ** repeat for 2 sleeves collar/button band with a smaller needle pick up 148 sts starting from the bottom of the sweater around the front neck and other front make sure you have an even number of stitches divisible by 4 if picking up less or more than 148 *** if you want button holes on one side of the sweater place stitch markers for button holes when you get to the markers you will *yo k2tog* for the buttonhole *k2 p2* for 2 / 5cm add button band above *k2 p2* for 2 / 5cm more approx 12 row total bind off loosely in 2 x 2 rib *** if you don t want button band and just want rib collar *k2 p2* for 4 / 10cm approx 12 row total bind off loosely in 2 x 2 rib 2024 copyright pattern and images - marny kindness 3 weave in ends attach buttons if needed very light blocking if needed put a damp cloth on the sweater and press down do not heavy wet block reshape to dry flat enjoy warmth share your photos on ravelry and on instagram using #marnykindnessdesigns tag me at @supermarno 2024 copyright pattern and images -
